settings.title: App Settings
settings.enableNotifications: Please enable notifications in your device settings to receive updates.

faqs.q1: How do I add a new item?
faqs.a1: Go to the Wardrobe tab and tap the 'New' button at the top right. You can take a photo with your camera or select one from your gallery. Our AI will automatically analyze it and remove the background.
faqs.q2: What is the Free Plan limit?
faqs.a2: The Free Plan allows you to store up to 10 items in your wardrobe and generate 2 outfits per day. Upgrade to Pro for unlimited storage and creation!
faqs.q3: How does the AI Stylist work?
faqs.a3: Our stylist analyzes the color, season, and style of your clothes to create harmonized outfits based on your preferences. The more clothes you add, the better the suggestions become.
faqs.q4: Can I use the app offline?
faqs.a4: Wardrobe requires an internet connection for AI analysis and cloud syncing, but you can view your existing collection offline.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.content: We collect certain information about how you use our app, including your wardrobe items, outfit preferences, and usage analytics to improve our AI generation.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: Your data is stored securely using Supabase. We prioritize the security and confidentiality of your personal information and wardrobe data.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use third-party services like Google Vision and Gemini for image analysis. These services only receive the images you choose to upload for wardrobe processing.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data at any time through the app settings or by contacting our support team.

privacyPolicy.footer: By using Ornatus, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. We may update this policy periodically.

language.title: Language
language.noteDesc: Changing the language will update the user interface. Some AI-generated content might still appear in the language it was created.

onboarding.slide1Desc: Prenez une photo de vos vêtements et laissez l'IA faire le reste. Ornatus reconnaît et catégorise vos articles automatiquement.
onboarding.slide2Desc: Donnez vie à votre garde-robe avec l'IA. Ornatus analyse vos vêtements et crée des tenues parfaites selon la météo et votre style.
onboarding.slide3Desc: Terminez le dilemme quotidien 'que porter' avec votre garde-robe intelligente. Prêt à créer votre propre style?
